body:
You define int32 kernels for gather but did not register the corresponding op. So the change will have no effect.

Also, with int64 I compiled and saw no error. Not sure what was the error you saw or was it an issue with cuda version.
body_html:
You define int32 kernels for gather but did not register the corresponding op. So the change will have no effect.

Also, with int64 I compiled and saw no error. Not sure what was the error you saw or was it an issue with cuda version.
body_text:
You define int32 kernels for gather but did not register the corresponding op. So the change will have no effect.
Also, with int64 I compiled and saw no error. Not sure what was the error you saw or was it an issue with cuda version.
